Government » City Council

Mayor

Font Size: + -
Share & Bookmark Share & Bookmark, Press Enter to show all options, press Tab go to next option
  • Email
  • Facebook
  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter
  • Reddit
Feedback Print

 Mayor Alvaro “Al” Arreola was born in Ciudad Acuña,, Coahuila, Mexico. One of nine siblings, Arreola relocated to the United States in 1967 with his mother. After graduating from Del Rio High School in 1977, Arreola landed a job at the local Zales jewelry store. Arreola is currently the store manager for the Zales in Del Rio and has been with the company for 43 years. 

 

Mayor Arreola has been heavily involved in the community for many years. A seasoned volunteer, Arreola served on the San Felipe Del Rio C.I.S.D Board of Trustees from 1997-2003, the Del Rio City Council from 2010 – 2014, the Del Rio Economic Development Corporation from 2018 – 2021, on the Val Verde Regional Medical Center Board from 2018 – 2022 and currently serves on the Middle Rio Grande Workforce Finance Committee.

 

Arreola has been married to his lovely wife, Myrella for 42 years and they are the proud parents of Al Jr. and Myrella Isabel. 

 

Mayor Arreola is committed to dedicating more funding for community improvements, investing in security, law enforcement and first responders. A businessman and true advocate for Del Rio, Arreola pledges to have a strict focus on the community.
